summary: A group of students traveling to California are menaced by a vicious group of skin-heads in the Colorado mountains. A WW2 vet living in the mountains comes to their rescue.
cast: Chuck Connors|Barbara Bain|Jason Culp|Brian Brophy|Liz Sagal|Bill Kohne|Lynna Hopwood|Gene Mitchell|Frank Noon|Dennis Ott|James A. Stunden|Michael Fox|Bunny Summers|Jadili Johnson|Cynthia Cheston|Duane Davis|Clark Corkum|Trevor Clark
keywords: woman murders a woman|murderess|neo nazi|racism|white supremacist
title: Skinheads
